channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Science Behind Rare Gulf Effect Snow Potential In Tampa Bay
item.description: Could parts of Tampa Bay, Florida experience Gulf effect snow this weekend? Our expert explains.

item.title: German chancellor on Trump’s claim that it didn’t fight in Afghanistan: we lost 59 soldiers
item.description: Friedrich Merz said that not only did 59 German troops die in Afghanistan over nearly 20 years, but well over 100 were wounded as well.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Friday, January 30
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: A spectre is haunting Europe — the spectre of Trump. Cue the Asian trade deals
item.description: From a purely economic perspective, Trump's import tariffs have sent countries seeking new markets to reduce their dependency on the American consumer...

item.title: Climate change mans Southern Africa got a year’s worth of rain in just 10 days, killing over 100 people
item.description: Around 1.3 million people across southern Africa were affected by this month's floods, The World Health Organization said.

item.title: What Minnesota resistance really looks like: a health care worker who patrols in her beat-up Subaru, watching for signs of federal agents
item.description: "Sunshine" says she can spot idling SUVs, out-of-state plates and the difference between an undercover cop car from an unmarked immigration vehicle.

item.title: How Portable Ultrasounds Keep Astronauts Healthy
item.description: In this week’s edition of The Prototype, we look at how a new discovery could lead to unsinkable ships, the billions invested in AI “neolabs” and more...

item.title: How Can Xbox Justify Another Hardware Generation After Sharp Declines?
item.description: New Xbox revenue figures are in and they are very bad, especially in the hardware department. Can Microsoft afford to invest it ieven more?

item.title: ServiceNow’s AI Strategy Fuels Strong Q4 Earnings As Enterprise Adoption Accelerates
item.description: ServiceNow beat Q4 earnings expectations as subscription revenue climbed 21%, intensifying its fight with Microsoft and Salesforce for control of ente...

item.title: How stroopwafels and saffron tiramisu fit into Starbucks’ plan to get to 40,000 stores around the world
item.description: The CEO of its international business doesn't see anti-U.S. feeling hurting business.

item.description: Federal Reserve policymakers left interest rates unchanged at its January meeting after cutting rates at its three prior meetings amid uncertainty ove...

item.title: New study shows cities where cost of living is rising fastest
item.description: Major U.S. cities face surging living costs as new analysis reveals inflation impact across 30 metropolitan areas, with New York City hit hardest.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
